      • indexHandler

        @RequestMapping("index")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView indexHandler​(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession)
                                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        The handler for action = "index"

        if customer is registered in the application, there will be transition to a page "index.jsp" (the page: "Home")

        if customer is not registered in the application, there will be transition to a page "login.jsp" (the page: "Login page")

        Parameters:
        httpSession - httpSession
        Returns:
        an object of ModelAndView
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if JPQL query was executed with an error

      • loginHandler

        @RequestMapping({"","/","/login"})
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView loginHandler​(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession)
        The handler for action = "/login", "", "/"

        if customer is registered in the application, there will be redirect to a page "viewaccounts.jsp" (the page: "Accounts list")

        if customer is not registered in the application, there will be transition to a page "login.jsp" (the page: "Login page")

        Parameters:
        httpSession - httpSession
        Returns:
        an object of ModelAndView

      • viewcustomersHandler

        @RequestMapping("/viewcustomers")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView viewcustomersHandler​(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession)
                                                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        The handler for action = "/viewcustomers"

        if customer is registered in the application and is administrator, there will be transition to a page: "viewcustomers.jsp" (the page: "Customers list")

        if customer is registered in the application and is not administrator, there will be transition to a page: "index.jsp" (the page: "Home")

        if customer is not registered in the application, there will be transition to a page "login.jsp" (the page: "Login page")

        Parameters:
        httpSession - httpSession
        Returns:
        an object of ModelAndView
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if JPQL query was executed with an error

      • editSaveHandler

        @RequestMapping(value="/editsave",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView editSaveHandler​(@Valid @ModelAttribute("newCustomer")
                                                                    @Valid Customer newCustomer,
                                                                    org.springframework.validation.BindingResult errors,
                                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession)
        The handler for action = "/editsave"

        if Customer validation has errors, there will be transition to a page: "editcustomer.jsp" (the page: "Edit customer")

        if customer is registered in the application and is administrator, there will be redirect to a page: "viewcustomers.jsp" (the page: "Customers list")

        if customer is registered in the application and is not administrator, there will be redirect to a page: "index.jsp" (the page: "Home")

        if customer is not registered in the application, there will be redirect to a page "login.jsp" (the page: "Login page")

        Parameters:
        httpSession - HttpSession
        errors - BindingResult
        newCustomer - Customer
        Returns:
        an object, instance of ModelAndView

        @RequestMapping(value="/createnewcustomer",
                method=POST)
@ExceptionHandler(SpringException.class)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView createNewCustomerHandler​(@Valid @ModelAttribute("newCustomer")
                                                                             @Valid Customer newCustomer,
                                                                             org.springframework.validation.BindingResult errors,
                                                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        The handler for action = "/createnewcustomer" It saves a new customer in the application.

        if Customer validation has errors, there will be transition to a page: "addcustomer.jsp" (the page: "Add customer")

        if customer is registered in the application (it means isAdmin = true, because only administrator can see page "Customers List"), there will be transition to a page: "viewcustomers.jsp" (the page: "Customers List")

        if customer is not registered in the application (a new user tries to register), there will be redirect to a page "viewaccounts.jsp" (the page: "Accounts list")

        Parameters:
        newCustomer - Customer
        request - HttpServletRequest
        errors - BindingResult
        Returns:
        an object, instance of ModelAndView

      • createNewBankHandler

        @RequestMapping(value="/createnewbank",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView createNewBankHandler​(@ModelAttribute("newBank")
                                                                         Bank newBank,
                                                                         org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView mav,
                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession)
        The handler for action = "/createnewbank" It saves a new bank in the application.

        if customer is registered in the application, there will be redirect to a page: "viewbanks.jsp" (the page: "Banks List")

        if customer is not registered in the application, there will be redirect to a page "login.jsp" (the page: "Login page")

        Parameters:
        newBank - Bank
        mav - ModelAndView
        httpSession - HttpSession
        Returns:
        an object, instance of ModelAndView

      • createNewAccountHandler

        @RequestMapping(value="/createnewaccount",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView createNewAccountHandler​(@Valid @ModelAttribute("newAccount")
                                                                            @Valid Account newAccount,
                                                                            org.springframework.validation.BindingResult errors,
                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession,
                                                                            org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView mav)
                                                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        The handler for action = "/createnewaccount". It saves a new account in the application.

        if account validation has errors, there will be transition to a page: "addaccount.jsp" (the page: "Add account")

        if customer is registered in the application, there will be redirect to a page: "viewaccounts.jsp" (the page: "Account list")

        if customer is not registered in the application, there will be redirect to a page "login.jsp" (the page: "Login page")

        Parameters:
        newAccount - Account
        errors - BindingResult
        httpSession - HttpSession
        mav - ModelAndView
        Returns:
        an object, instance of ModelAndView
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if JPQL query was executed with an error

      • createNewPaymentHandler

        @RequestMapping(value="/createnewpayment",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView createNewPaymentHandler​(@ModelAttribute("newPayment")
                                                                            Payment newPayment,
                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession,
                                                                            org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView mav)
        The handler for action = "/createnewpayment". It saves a new payment in the application.

        if account validation has errors, there will be transition to a page: "addpayment.jsp" (the page: "Add payment")

        if customer is registered in the application, there will be redirect to a page: "viewpayments.jsp" (the page: "Payment list")

        if customer is not registered in the application, there will be redirect to a page "login.jsp" (the page: "Login page")

      • saveTransactionToAndBetweenHandler

        @RequestMapping(value={"/savetransactionto","/savetransactionbetween"},
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView saveTransactionToAndBetweenHandler​(@ModelAttribute("newPayment")
                                                                                       Payment newPayment,
                                                                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        The handler for action = "/savetransactionto" and "/savetransactionbetween". It creates 2 new transactions (debit and credit) between bank accounts of customer in the application.

        if account validation has errors, there will be transition to a page: "createtransactionbetween.jsp" (the page: "Create a transaction between my accounts") or "createtransactionto.jsp" (the page: "Create a transaction to my other account") (accordingly)

        if customer is registered in the application, there will be redirect to a page: "viewaccounts.jsp" (the page: "Accounts list") or "viewpayments.jsp" (the page: "Payments list") (accordingly)

        if customer is not registered in the application, there will be redirect to a page "login.jsp" (the page: "Login page")

        Parameters:
        newPayment - Payment
        request - HttpServletRequest
        Returns:
        an object, instance of ModelAndView
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if JPQL query was executed with an error

      • checkLoginPassHandler

        @RequestMapping(value="/checkLoginPass",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView checkLoginPassHandler​(@RequestParam("username")
                                                                          java.lang.String username,
                                                                          @RequestParam("password")
                                                                          java.lang.String password)
                                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        The handler for action = "checkLoginPass". It checks username and password.

        if "username and password" validation has errors, there will be transition to a page: "login.jsp" (the page: "Login page")

        if "username and password" are correct, there will be redirect to a page:

        it has a role admin: "viewaccounts.jsp" (the page: "Account list")

        it doesn't have a role admin: "index.jsp" (the page: "Home")

        Parameters:
        username - String
        password - String
        Returns:
        an object, instance of ModelAndView
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if JPQL query was executed with an error

      • SignOutHandler

        @RequestMapping("/signout")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView SignOutHandler​(org.springframework.web.bind.support.SessionStatus sessionStatus)
        The handler for action = "signout". It removes object of customer from session "signout".

        there will be transition to a page: "login.jsp" (the page: "Login page")

        Parameters:
        sessionStatus - SessionStatus
        Returns:
        an object, instance of ModelAndView
